name: copilotprompts-m365-generate-mermaid-diagram
title: Mermaid Diagram/Chart Generator
shortDescription: Generate Mermaid diagrams from text descriptions
longDescription: This prompt helps you generate a Mermaid diagram based on a given description. Mermaid is a powerful tool for creating diagrams and visualizations using a simple markdown-like syntax. With this prompt, you can easily create flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, and more by providing a textual description of the desired diagram.
